text: WhatsApp collects account information including phone number, profile name, and profile picture. We collect usage and log information, including how you interact with our services. Device and connection information is also collected. Messages are end-to-end encrypted, but metadata is collected.
sharing: We share information with Meta companies to improve services, provide integrations, and show relevant ads on other Meta platforms. We share with service providers and for legal compliance.
retention: Messages stored on your device. Undelivered messages deleted after 30 days. Account information retained while account is active. Some data retained longer for legal and safety reasons.
positives: Can control who sees profile info
